655:1: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamuniḥ punarapi śuddhāvāsabhavanamavalokya mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma |
655:2: asti mañjuśrīḥ ! tvadīye kalpavisare sarvasādhanopayike mantracaryābhiyuktasya sādhanakāle sarvamantrāṇāṃ sarvakalpavistareṣu rāhurāgamanasurāṇāmadhipateḥ sarvagrahānāyakasya grahasaṃjñā candradivākarādiṣu nakṣatrayogena dṛśyante |
655:3: ta śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru te bhāṣiṣye ||
655:4: evamukte bhagavatā śākyamuninā samyak sambuddhena mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā bhagavatastriḥpradakṣiṇīkṛtya dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃ tenāñjali pragṛhya bhagavataścaraṇayornipatya punarevotthāya bhagavantamanimiṣaṃ vyavalokayamānaḥ utphullanayano bhūtvā hṛṣṭatuṣṭo bhagavantamevamāha - tat sādhu bhagavāṃ nirdiśatu rāhorāgamanam ;
655:5: yatra sattvānāṃ mantracaryābhiyuktānāṃ siddhikālaṃ bhaveyuriti sarvasattvānāṃ ca sukhodayaṃ śubhāśubhanimittaṃ vā;
655:8: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamuniḥ mañjuśriyasya kumārabhūtasya sādhukāramadāt |
655:9: sādhu mañjuśrīḥ ! yastvaṃ tathāgatametamatha paripraśnase sarvasattvānāṃ ca hitāyodyuktaḥ |
655:14: yadā devāsuraṃ yuddhaṃ vartate ca mahad bhayam |
655:21: apsarāṃ prekṣate daityaḥ yadā kāle nabhastalam ||
655:22: tadā candramasapūrṇaḥ kare vāme sa daityarāṭ |
655:26: tadā tārkikā mānavā āhuḥ āgreyaṃ maṇḍalaṃ vibhoḥ |
655:27: yadā tu nīlarakte'smiṃ prabhā nīlatāṃ vrajet ||
655:28: tadā nīlamiti jñeyaṃ śaśine bhāskare'pi vā |
655:35: tasmāt tathāgataṃ jñānaṃ samyak tena niyojayet ||
655:38: yadā kāle bhuvi martyānāṃ rāhorāgamanaṃ bhuvi |
655:42: ubhau tau yugmataḥ grāsaṃ divā rātrau ca kathyate |
655:44: bharaṇyāṃ tu yadā candraṃ ravervā maṇḍalāśrayet |
655:46: kṛttikāsu yadā candraḥ rāhunā grasyate dhruvam |
655:47: rātrau vā yadi prabhāte vā yāmānte ninditaṃ hitam ||
655:48: tadā vindyā mahad duḥkhaṃ vyādhisambhavameva vā |
655:51: mṛgaśirāsu yadā candraḥ bhāskaro vā nabhastale ||
655:52: rāhuṇā grastapūrvau tau astaṃ yātau maharddhikau |
655:60: puṇyāśleṣau yadā candre bhāskare vā nabhastale |
655:64: rāhuṇā saha mudyanto astaṃ yātau grahottamau |
655:68: madhyāhne'thavā rātre ca mucyate ca punaḥ kṣaṇāt |
655:71: grastau saha mucyete astaṃ yātau ca duḥkhadā ||
655:74: diśaḥ sarve samantādvai durbhikṣaṃ cāpi nirdiśet |
655:81: udayantaṃ tadā grastaṃ uditaṃ vāpi sarvataḥ ||
655:82: astaṃ yātena tenaiva śaśino rāhuṇā sadā |
655:86: rājā vai naśyate tatra vyādhinā saha mūrchitaḥ |
655:88: tatra duḥkhaṃ mahāvyādhi tatra dṛśyati bhūtale |
655:94: uttarāyāṃ yadā yuktaḥ nakṣatre bhadrapade tathā |
655:95: rāhurāgamanaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ divā rātrau tu ninditam ||
655:96: revatyāṃ tu yadā candraḥ rāhuṇā grasta sarvataḥ |
655:103: nakṣatramālā vicitrā vai bhramate vai nabhastale ||
655:106: nakṣatraṃ kathitaṃ pūrvaṃ tasya taṃ kurute'nyathā |
655:107: īṣat pramāṇaṃ na doṣo'sti bahuvācāsti ninditam ||
655:109: kālaṃ kathitaṃ jñeyaṃ niyamaṃ caiva kīrtyate ||
655:111: sagrahau yadi tatrasthau ravicandrau tu dṛśyate ||
655:113: anyathā niṣphalaṃ vidyāt prabhāvaṃ vāpi nindite ||
655:116: tadā mahad bhayaṃ vidyāt paracakrabhayet tadā |
655:117: śaśine bhāskare cāpi dhūmravarṇo yadā bhavet ||
655:118: paryeṣā dvitrayo vā vā tatra vidyānmahad bhayam |
655:121: grīṣme śarade caiva dhūmikā yadi jāyate ||
655:122: samantāt saptarātraṃ tu tatra vidyānmahad bhayam |
655:123: divā vā yadi vā rātrau dhūmikā yadi jāyate ||
655:125: pūrvavat kathitaṃ sarvaṃ yathā nirghāt ulkinām ||
655:129: śarade yadi hemante grīṣme prāvṛṣe'pi vā ||
655:131: śubhāśubhaṃ tathā jñeyaṃ divā vā yadi vāniśā ||
655:132: niḥphalaṃ cāpi vidyā vai saphalāṃ cāpi kīrttitām |
655:134: tatra dhūmo bhaved yadyat samantāścaiva nabhastale |
655:135: acirāt tatra tad rājyaṃ ghātyate śastribhiḥ sadā ||
655:144: grīṣme ca kathitā mṛtyuḥ śaratkāle ca ninditam |
655:145: hemante ca vasante ca tāmravarṇaḥ pradṛśyate ||
655:148: prāvṛḍkāle tathā śubhre pīto vā na ca + + + + |
655:153: atikaṣṭaṃ surā hyetaṃ bhayaṃ vā rasadūṣitam ||
655:154: mahāpraṇādaṃ ghoraṃ ca śukre vai ca nabhastale |
655:157: sagrahe bhāskare candre yadā rāho mahadbhaye ||
655:162: vividhā vā na vā sarve vividhā prāṇasambhavāḥ |
655:166: sarve te sādhyamāne vai siddhiṃ gaccheyu sagrahā |
655:167: grahe candre yadā bhāno rāhuṇārtho'pi sagrahe ||
655:168: tasmiṃ kāle tadā jāpī mantramāvartayet sadā |
655:170: sattvopakāraṃ phalaṃ hyetat pratiṣṭhā tatra dṛśyate |
655:171: sidhyante mantrarāṭ kṣipraṃ grahe japtā sarāhuke ||
655:175: vidhiyuktāstu vai mantrā vihīnāṃ neṣyate dhruvam ||
655:180: mantre sujapte yukte ca tantrayuktena hetunā |
655:183: sidhyante sagrahā kṣiptā japtā kāleṣu yojitā ||
655:187: vidyā karmaphalaṃ caiva hetu cānya niyojayet ||
655:189: dadyāt karmaphalaṃ kṣipraṃ sā vidyā hetuyojitā ||
655:190: sā vidyā phalato jñeyā buddhaiścāpi supūjitā |
655:192: pradadyuḥ karmato siddhiṃ sā vidyā karmasu yojitā |
655:193: śreyasā caiva yojayet na mantrāṇāṃ gatigocaram ||
655:195: niḥphalaṃ karmato vā vā phalaṃ karmaṃ ca tatra ca ||
655:198: na phalaṃ karma kramaṃ hanti nāphalaṃ karma kriyā parā |
655:201: mantrarāṭ siddhyate tatra phalā karmeṣu yojitā ||
655:203: na yoniḥ karmato jñeyaṃ yo niyuktaḥ sadā phale ||
655:208: na guṇaṃ dravyato jñeyaṃ nādravyaṃ guṇamucyate |
655:216: prabhavaṃ sarvataḥ karma guṇadravyaṃ ca siddhyate |
655:219: mānasā mantranirdiṣṭā na vācā manasā vinā ||
655:220: vānyato mantravijñeyā na vānyā manase vinā |
655:223: samyag dṛṣṭi tathā karmaṃ vāk cittaṃ ca yojitam ||
655:229: na cittena vinā mantraṃ na smṛtyā saha cittayoḥ ||
655:230: samyak smṛtyā ca citte ca dṛśyate mantrasiddhaye |
655:231: na smṛtyā ca vinirmuktā mantra uktastathāgataiḥ ||
655:233: dṛśyante ūrjitaṃ mantraiḥ sidhyante ca samādhinā ||
655:236: sidhyante mantrarāṭ tatra yogaṃ cāpi supuṣkalam |
655:242: saṅkalpā mantra sidhyante samyak te vidhiyojitāḥ |
655:243: na pūjya mantrarāṭ sarve samyak saṅkalpavarjitāḥ ||
655:246: ājīve śuddhitāṃ yāti mantrā samyak prayojitā |
655:248: ājīvaṃ hi phalaṃ yukto samyageva suyojayet |
655:249: samyak sañjīvarato mantrī śuddhacittaḥ sadā śucau ||
655:252: kravyādā yetarā mantrā ye cānye parikīrtitā |
655:257: svayaṃ na sidhyate vidhinā hīnā aśaucācārarateṣvapi ||
655:259: tasmānmantraṃ na kurvīta vidhihīnaṃ tu karmayoḥ ||
655:261: sādhyāstu tathā mantrā āryā buddhaistu bhāṣitā ||
